overview: Scented candles, tingling oils, spiritual music and throbbing desires brings this client closer to his masseur. Martin is stressed from a long week, so he invites his "friend" Greg to come over and give him a rub down. Alex is a hard working fireman who goes to see Travis for a massage. Travis is so turned on by his fire fighting outfit that he is quick to take Alex's uniform off and really get to work. These two stud-muffins are going to flex their muscles and extend their rods after a healthy rub down.
title: Massage Me & Fuck Me
